title: Ahead
content: You worm yourself into the crawl. The roof lowers even further as you proceed -- you hate this, walls pressing in like a stone gullet -- until suddenly there is no floor ahead. Crawl At Pit The crawl ends as the floor falls away, into a wide pit. You can see no bottom, and the walls are slick-polished. You can go no farther this way.
options: Go back to where you were
